    • Method Detail

      • drawNextGen

        public void drawNextGen(DynamicGameBoard dynamicGameBoard,
                        javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                        javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        This method is the main method for drawing the nextGeneration of the game. It iterates through the chosen DynamicGameBoard and checks if cells are alive. If they live, they are drawn with a color chosen by the ColorPicker. Dead cells are also drawn but with white background.
        Parameters:
        dynamicGameBoard - Draws on the chosen DynamicBoard
        gc - Uses GraphicContext to draw on the canvas.
        color - Color is used as parameter to get the ColorPicker value in Controller Class.

      • clearDrawing

        public void clearDrawing(DynamicGameBoard dynamicGameBoard,
                         javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
        This method iterates through a dynamicBoard and draws all aliveCells to white. Indicating that all is dead.
        Parameters:
        dynamicGameBoard - Draws on the chosen DynamicBoard
        gc - Uses GraphicContext to draw on the canvas.

      • getCellSize

        public int getCellSize()
        A getter to return the used cellSize for each drawn cell.
        Returns:
        Return an int variable.

      • setCellSize

        public void setCellSize(int cellSize)
        A setter for setting the cellSize to a new value.
        Parameters:
        cellSize - Takes and int to set a new cellSize.
